title: Als Je Ons Kan Horen
overview: Four-part documentary series that looks back on the Dutroux case, 25 years ago.It has been 25 years since the White March took place and Marc Dutroux was imprisoned. This documentary series shows how justice, politics, the victims' families and the Belgian population dealt with the Dutroux case. The largest mediatised kidnapping case Belgium has ever known, and shook it to its foundations.Â
